channel.title: How do i make certin places wildy?
channel.description: I know how to make places non-wild but how do i make them wildy? If you can tell me what to search that would be great. _______________________________________________ An irrelevant question. Hey guys can you tell me how to (if possible) to get these windows xp bars to windows vista? [IMG]http://i359.photobucket.com/albums/oo31/D_T_55/vist.jpg[/img]

item.title: How do i make certin places wildy?
item.dc:creator: @D_T_55 D T 55
item.description:
@D_T_55 wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:2, topic:252126"]You could make a boolean to handle all the Wilderness coordinates, and edit your Attack methods to check if both players are in the area while attacking.

Also at your second question, this is for server related help only.[/quote]

thats why I said “An irrelevant question.”…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2008, 09:09:12 pm[/size][hr]im a new coder so maybe a little more description would help some…not asking to be spoon fed though…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make certin places wildy?

item.title: How do i make certin places wildy?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You could make a boolean to handle all the Wilderness coordinates, and edit your Attack methods to check if both players are in the area while attacking.

Also at your second question, this is for server related help only.

Read full topic
